kind words

Photographer can be truly proud of themselves and their work if what they have done has brought real happiness and joy to their clients.

We try to maintain our good reputation, so we approach each project with great enthusiasm and a lot of new interesting ideas. Our experts share their thoughts on organizing a photo session and also listen to the opinion of the couple. They take into account all the wishes of future newlyweds. This allows to make their work as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

Deep respect, interest, openness and dedication to our work helps us receive a lot of positive feedback from satisfied customers.

We have loved our experience with Vanilla Brides. We worked with photographer Maria and videographer Alex and loved them both. We have not received our photos yet, but the whole experience has been incredible. Maria went above and beyond to meet with us prior to the wedding and go over every detail she needed to capture what we were looking for. She even coordinated communication among our vendors so everyone was on the same page. We can't wait to see our photos and video and have no doubt that they will be absolutely perfect. Highly recommended to everyone!

hanna & jack
